meta.title: Heads-Up Zone - Fruit Clash
meta.description: Essential info and disclaimers for players of Fruit Clash.

sections.title: Game Disclaimer
paragraphs: Fruit Clash is a fictional game developed purely for fun and entertainment. Any similarities to real fruit battles or orchard scenarios are entirely coincidental.
The gameplay is designed to be colorful and exciting, but it does not reflect actual fruit-slicing techniques or real-world fruit behavior.

sections.title: Age Appropriateness
paragraphs: Fruit Clash is suitable for players of all ages. It contains no violence, offensive language, or adult content.

sections.title: Internet Connection
paragraphs: Some features of Fruit Clash require an internet connection, such as downloading content updates, joining fruit battles, or syncing across devices.
You can still enjoy the main game modes offline after installation.
